data.title: The good news: Meat Pies tested in Iceland contain no horse meat.  The bad news: They also apparently contain no meat of any kind.

China Building 29 Nuclear Reactors, 40% of the World's Total - After  Fukushima meltdown, Germany announced it'd decommission all nuclear plants. Switzerland & Italy rejected proposals to build more. Japan shut down  reactors & hasn't restarted them. China, on the other hand, plowed ahead.
